data.name: Magic Thief Soundtrack
data.detailed_description: Music created to emphasize the atmosphere of the magical Middle Ages of the world of Magic Thief. Sometimes mysterious, bewitching music and melodic string picking are complemented by the instruments of a classical symphony orchestra.
data.about_the_game: Music created to emphasize the atmosphere of the magical Middle Ages of the world of Magic Thief. Sometimes mysterious, bewitching music and melodic string picking are complemented by the instruments of a classical symphony orchestra.
data.short_description: Music created to emphasize the atmosphere of the magical Middle Ages of the world of Magic Thief. Sometimes mysterious, bewitching music and melodic string picking are complemented by the instruments of a classical symphony orchestra.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 70 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 306 MB available space
